Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photo of the defaced Lincoln Memorial is a doctored image and the vandalism did not actually happen.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the extent of the damage and defacement of the statue by stating that it was "damaged and defaced," when in reality, the image was digitally manipulated.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it only relies on a doctored image without any evidence or credible sources to back it up.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the media is trying to hide the photo, without providing any evidence or justification for this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the image is a doctored photo created for a conservative show and not an actual depiction of the Lincoln Memorial vandalism.
